markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Phalanx Breaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3173) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 113</row>

**Prerequisites**
[way of the vanguard](/Ways.aspx?ID=4)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a two-handed firearm or a two-handed crossbow.

</column>

---

You know that to take out an enemy formation, you must punch a hole through its center. Make a ranged Strike with the required weapon against a target within the weapon's first range increment. The target is [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) directly back 10 feet (20 feet on a critical hit), and if this pushes the target into an obstacle, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to half your level.
name: Phalanx Breaker
requirement: You're wielding a two-handed firearm or a two-handed crossbow.
requirement_markdown: You're wielding a two-handed firearm or a two-handed crossbow.
